sections.title: Mission
sections.snippet: Does everyone know what they’re fighting for? What is your mission?

sections.title: Values
sections.description: Core values the company lives by
sections.snippet: Core values are the fundamental beliefs of the company. What are they, and why are they important?

sections.title: Diversity
sections.snippet: What is the current state of diversity at your company? What are your goals, and what needs to happen to achieve them?

sections.title: Competition
sections.snippet: Who are the competitors you’re paying attention to? Why? What other big external threats do you see?

sections.title: CEO Update
sections.snippet: Provide an overview of important happenings in the company since the last update.

sections.title: Highlights
sections.snippet: What new company milestones or accomplishments are you most proud of?

sections.title: Growth
sections.description: Growth metrics and key performance indicators
sections.snippet: Provide context about recent growth. Why are these metrics important? How are they performing against targets? What is impacting them?
sections.prompt:
Enter the most important growth metric for the stakeholders of your company. You'll be able
          to add more later.

sections.title: Key Challenges
sections.snippet: What are you most disappointed about, and what’s the plan to fix it? What threats should everyone be focused on?

sections.title: Key Takeaways
sections.snippet:
What’s something you recently learned about your business, market, customers, or product?
          What changes are you making as a result?

sections.title: Team and Hiring
sections.snippet: Announce and welcome new hires, discuss open positions and progress being made to fill them, and let everyone know about employees that have left.

sections.title: Product
sections.snippet: What's shipped recently and how has the roadmap changed? How is the market responding? What’s working? What’s not?

sections.title: Customer Service
sections.snippet: Is customer satisfaction trending up or down? How are you tracking it? What key issues do your customers have?

sections.title: Marketing and Customer Acquisition
sections.snippet: List any notable marketing activities since the last update. How are your current marketing efforts performing? Anything new planned?

sections.title: Press
sections.snippet: List any notable press mentions since the last update. Provide an update on PR activities.

sections.title: Sales
sections.description: Notable sales activity and wins and losses
sections.snippet: Did you close any notable sales? What opportunities are in the pipeline?

sections.title: Business Development
sections.description: Notable partnership activity and new deals
sections.snippet: Did you close any notable deals / partnerships? What opportunities are in the pipeline?

sections.title: How You Can Help
sections.description: Ask your company stakeholders for help and ideas
sections.snippet: Where do you need the most help from your team and investors?

sections.title: Kudos
sections.description: Celebrate great actions that helped the company
sections.snippet: Who went above and beyond to help the company? What did they do?

sections.title: Finances
sections.description: Cash on hand, burn and runway
sections.snippet: Provide context about recent changes in company finances

sections.title: Compensation
sections.description: Founder, executive and employee compensation practices
sections.snippet: What thought process or formula do you use to determine pay and equity? Would you like to share high-level summaries or detailed information?

sections.title: Ownership
sections.snippet: What would you like to share about company ownership, such as the # of shares outstanding and size of the employee option pool? Is there a formula used to allocate options?

sections.title: Fundraising
sections.snippet: When are you raising, and how much would you like to raise? How will you use the funds? Link to the pitch deck, and let everyone know how it’s going. If you’ve already raised, who are the new investors and what are the terms?
